definitions.example: Please direct your attention to the following words.

definitions.definition: An action or remark expressing concern for or interest in someone or something, especially romantic interest.
A state of alertness in the standing position.
definitions.example: The company will now come to attention.

definitions.definition: Used as a command to bring soldiers to the attention position.
A call for people to be quiet/stop doing what they are presently doing and pay heed to what they are to be told or shown.
